column1: Utterly visionary and chimerical: a federal response to the Depression. an examination of Civilian Conservation Corps construction on national forest system lands in the Pacific Northwest.
column5: This Masters thesis discusses the historical impact of the CCC on the economy and focuses on the architecture and construction projects in the Northwest, specifically the Ninth Corps Area of Washington and Oregon.
column10: United States -- Idaho -- Washington County -- Weiser
column20: In Copyright - Educational Use Permitted by Rights Holder, Elizabeth Gail Throop. For more information, please contact University of Idaho Library Special Collections and Archives Department at libspec@uidaho.edu. http://rightsstatements.org/vocab/InC-EDU/1.0/

column1: Civilian Conservation Corps,  1933 – 1942, on the  Payette National Forest
column5: A review of the impacts and organization of the CCC in the Payette National Forest, including research and historic context for the State Historic Preservation Office decision committees.
